p: MCT TR-ROC was based on the non-parametric program option due to departure from a normal distribution of data sets analyzed. PP threshold values for each of the assays were similar irrespective of serum panels analyzed and the methods used for the determination of cut-offs: 13.46, 13.12 ( Figure 1A) and 13.35 ( Figure 2A) for WAg I-ELISA; 16.13, 15.15 ( Figure 1B) and 16.44 ( Figure 2B) for NP I-ELISA; 26.52, 25.12 ( Figure 1C) and 26.28 ( Figure 2C) for GP I-ELISA, respectively. The higher cut-off values for GP I-ELISA were likely due to higher ELISA noise resulting from not including a control antigen in this assay.
